----
const response = await client.security.putRoleMapping({
  name: "basic_users",
  roles: ["user"],
  rules: {
    any: [
      {
        field: {
          groups: "cn=users,dc=example,dc=com",
        },
      },
      {
        field: {
          dn: "cn=John Doe,cn=contractors,dc=example,dc=com",
        },
      },
    ],
  },
  enabled: true,
});
console.log(response);
----
